As Tuscon began projecting his powerful Sonar waves into the air, the affec=
t
on the sweeps is immediate and obvious as they begin flying in different
=
directions, it is as if they are nearly blind!

=93It is some sort of disru=
ptor wave.=94 One of the sweeps grunts, they are
close enough for Tuscon to=
 at least hear, even if he cannot see them via his
sensors. The sweeps look=
ed almost drunk as they tried to swing higher into
the air.

It seemed to b=
e having an impact on the sweeps that Kup and Straightshot
were dealing wit=
h as well. In an explosion of flames another falls from the
skies, while tr=
ailing behind it a rather large plume of smoke.

**************************=
***************

The remaining three sweeps come together trying to stay ou=
t of range of
Tuscon=92s waves of disruption, but another is knocked from t=
he skies by
Tuscon=92s missiles. The remaining two circle around, firing la=
ser beams down
at the Maximals!

Meanwhile at the tower as Windlord and Rat=
 Trap watched the tower began to
rumble, and a large door opened in its sid=
e, like some great jaw or perhaps
some ancient draw bridge part of the base=
=92s wall itself began to separate
from the rest and lower itself.

From in=
side the base several figures could be seen flying out! Deepstryke in
his c=
annon mode rose from the base, followed quickly by Phobia in jet mode
and s=
everal more sweep. They began to move away from the base in the
direction o=
f Tuscon and Kup.

The door to the base began to close.

******************=
***********************

Meanwhile back at the Ark Rodimus received Tuscon=
=92s message. =93Gotcha.=94 He
said as he quickly began to fortify the Ark=
=92s shielding. =93Shield at 100%=94 he
said to Tuscon.

=93Quickstride!=94=
 Rodimus said over the radio, =93Keep an optic out, from what
Tuscon is tel=
ling me the battle is getting bad out there.=94

Meanwhile in the skies abo=
ve Quickstride a small ripple appeared for a
moment. Perhaps it was a bit o=
f air displaced by heat, or perhaps it was
something more.

(TAG)

Preston

--002215401212fedf2c04976ee9e4
